title: Sparkling swimming pool, Full kitchen in apartment, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['Bonanza Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Fully furnished and unfurnished apartments', '-Large studio apartments', '-On Las Vegas CAT bus line', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-No long term lease required', '-Laundry Facility', '-Free premium cable TV', '-BBQ area and gazebo', '-Free utilities included', '-Elevator to upper level apartments', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Full kitchen in apartment', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
